prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Pavol is the developer of WebGPT, a web page generation service. He has also created Collboard, the first Czech virtual whiteboard, and H-edu, electronic textbooks used by tens of thousands of children.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: From Code to Classroom: Pavol's Innovations
